item.title: Command Help!
item.dc:creator: @CookieScape CookieScape
item.description:
@CookieScape wrote:

Your code is wrong if you want it in a 508. I don’t know how to correct it, as I’m a 317 guy, but it is wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: Command Help!
item.dc:creator: @kilop kilop
item.description:
@kilop wrote:

In most 508 servers you go to a folder called “src” then find a folder called “io” then a folder called “packets” then find “commands.java” and place the command in there.

Read full topic

item.description:

You’re retarded.[quote=“Delift3d, post:1, topic:349502”]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“money”)&& playerRights >= 2){ //Voule Command Generator if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“money”)){ //Voule Command Generator
addItem(995, 2140000000);
sendMessage(“You have MAX MONEY!!!”);

}[/quote]

addItem(0995,2140000000);

item.title: Command Help!

item.description:

Heres the code:

addItem(0995,2140000000);
sendMessage(“You have MAX MONEY!!!”);

}
